answers.answer: Im not bbw but i am thick & curvy & this is my first also.. i love tht u embrace saying BBW, tht shows tht ur vry comfortable& tht is a beautiful thing, congrats & happy pregnancy.

Im bbw and had my first child at 16.yeah iwas young but u just have to watch wht u eat because u dont want high blood pressure!! Im 20 nd on my second pregnancy and thts wht im concerned about but u should b finee:)
I'm veryso big myself. And so far have had no problems with this pregnancy. I'm 19w2d.

Im pregnant with my third child.  I was curvy but still over weight when i got pregnant this time.   I believe over wieght by 45 lbs.   And my dr said that me being over weight when i got pregnant put me at a higher risk for gestational diabetes.   Im 29weeks and 2 days. And have been diagnosed with gestational diabetes.      I didnt watch what i ate or exercise with this pregnancy. So i would advise u do so.  Dont end up like me. Checking ur blood sugar 4 times a day. And charting everything u eat isnt fun.

I'm a BBW too!!! Lol..love that..;-) I'm preggers with my fourth and I've never been thin...I've never had issues with high blood pressure or gestational diabetes while pregnant..I feel it has a lot to do with your over all health if you will have problems with that..I'm very careful whilst preggers to eat healthy and walk..with my first I let myself eat whatever I wanted and I gained 55 lbs!!! Second n third I stayed @ 30 lbs..hoping to do the same this time too..its nor so easy to loose lots of weight after baby has come..I started a 16 with first..now a 20 starting with fourth!! But I have good pregnancies in spite of being bigger..;-)

Thanx so much for the input ladies...I am genurally verrrrry healthy except thyroid low. Butttt everything is goin perfectttt. Im 1o weeks and 2days. My 1st. And im 32 yrs old. Im soooooo excited. And a verrrry proud BBW. Loving life. :) thanx again

I'm BBW and this is my second pregnancy. I didn't start showing in my first til I was like 20 weeks but pregnancy and labor were smooth and uncomplicated. I gained 30lbs and I had a small baby even though I was huge! I lost the weight pretty fast but my waist is bigger than it was. Old navy is great for maternity clothes for BBW in my experience. Congrats!

question: Hey ladies.... so for those of you who don't know what a BBW is its big beautiful woman. Also know, plus size. I ahappen to be a plus size woman. This is my very first time being pregnant. I was just curious if any mothers out here are plus size and how did being pregnant effect you? And labor and delivery....just was hoping for a few words.....
title: pregnant & being a BBW
